text: Mbe mbe gangiap guigira rivgi. Mbe rivgia Pita suanga buni kakagia thav, khaŋ Zisas ga nzuai, “Guma Rum, nza nzerara khaŋ ndagi. Nza nde suaŋv mpɨkava phuni khegenen muuŋgirga. Ndu suaŋv thevi, Moses ga suaŋv thevi, Iraiza suaŋv thevi.” 9.5-6 Kha kameŋ Rabai. Mbe khaŋ nzuai kameŋ ma. Mbe Hibruiŋ gum Zudaiŋ, mbe wari won kaman khaŋ nzuai Rabai. Nza Kiriiŋ, nzan kaman nza kha kameŋ nza khaŋ nzuai, “Guman Rum”, kha kameŋ Rabai maaŋ nzuai kameŋ ma.
